basics.name: Jolin W. Zhang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Marketing and Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.area: Marketing and Management Information Systems (expected Spring, 2025)

work.company: State of Hawai'i : Office of Enterprise Technology Services
highlights: Implementing proactive cybersecurity measures enhancing the State of Hawaii's financial system, ensuring compliance with industry standards and minimizing vulnerabilities through robust threat assessments and risk mitigation strategies.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy innovative security protocols and tools, effectively fortifying the state’s financial infrastructure against emerging cyber threats, resulting in increased system reliability and resilience.

Conduct comprehensive audits and analysis of financial systems' security posture, identifying and rectifying potential weakness, therapy contributing to optimization of cybersecurity frameworks and bolstering the state's fiscal integrity.

work.company: Lotus Honolulu at Diamond Head & Hotel Renew
highlights: Individually delivered efficient and high-quality service for 80-95% of guest occupancy through proactive initiatives on Hawai’i History.

Cultivated a welcoming atmosphere for guests and responded to inquiries, requests, and issues in a timely, personable, and efficient manner by promptly resolving concerns to accommodate and ensure 100% customer satisfaction.

Execute precise credit card transaction processes with attention to detail, ensuring balance and completion of approval. Classifying incentives, incidental fees and deposits accurately, contributing significantly to seamless financial transactions with 83% accuracy.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
